name: "Stuck Together, Torn Apart" Quiz | 'Family Guy'- Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What store are the Griffins in in the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Costmart.

	At Costmart, you can buy large amounts of unneeded items for a lower price than at other stores.  For example, people can buy twelve-packs of watermelons.

questions.text: What is the name of Lois' friend from college?
questions.explanation:
Ross.

	Ross Fishman states that Lois hasn't aged a bit, and he invites her for a friendly drink of coffee.  Peter instantly becomes involved.

questions.text: Who does Stewie become stuck to before he can eat glue?
questions.explanation:
Brian.

	Before eating super industrial glue, Brian intervenes and their hands get stuck together for the whole episode.

questions.text: How many weeks must Stewie and the one he is stuck to wait for a solvent for their glue?
questions.explanation:
Two.

	Brian and Stewie fight out the week together and end up saving a person who gets trapped down a well.

questions.text: Which of Peter's old girlfriends had an obsession with Peter?
questions.explanation:
Angie.

	Angie has pictures of Peter all around her house and she still wears the dress that she wore during their prom.  She hasn't washed her hand since Peter last touched it.

questions.text: What is the name of Peter's old girlfriend who visits the Griffins during dinner?
questions.explanation:
Dora.

	Dora became a prostitute and a smoker.  Lois immediately wonders what Peter is up to and they see a marriage counselor.

questions.text: In the marriage counselor's video footage, who does Lois read about in Meg's diary?
questions.explanation:
Kevin.

	Kevin is Joe's son and Meg has had a crush on him since he moved to Quahog.  Lois reads a passage about him to the whole family when Meg isn't in her room.

questions.text: Who does Lois go on a date with during the trial separation?
questions.explanation:
Quagmire & Glenn Quagmire & Glenn.

	Lois feels better about going on a date with someone she knows rather than an idiot.  She and Quagmire go on a date at the same place as Peter does.

questions.text: Peter goes on a date with Sarah Michelle Gellar.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Peter goes on a date with Jennifer Love Hewitt.  Lois and Peter work out their problems after Lois fights Jennifer in the restaurant, and Stewie and Brian get unstuck.

questions.text: Joe, Quagmire, and Cleveland all appear in this episode.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The four decide to go on a beer run in Joe's new police vehicle filled with state-of-the-art electronics.  They spy on Lois having her coffee with Ross.
